summary: The diff shows only frontend changes (App.tsx routing, Login.tsx authentication, HTML title, and documentation updates). No backend Motoko files were modified, and no deployment configuration changes are evident. All requirements (REQ-70 through REQ-75) focus on backend compilation fixes, module imports, stable storage patterns, and production deployment, none of which are addressed in the provided diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Analyze and fix all Motoko compilation errors in backend/main.mo that are preventing successful deployment to the Internet Computer production network
missing_requirements.reason: No modifications to backend/main.mo are present in the diff. The requirement explicitly targets Motoko compilation errors in the backend, but only frontend files were changed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify all HashMap operations and stable storage patterns in backend/main.mo use correct syntax compatible with the Motoko compiler version
missing_requirements.reason: No changes to backend/main.mo HashMap operations or stable storage patterns are present in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure all module imports in backend/main.mo reference valid Motoko base library modules with correct paths
missing_requirements.reason: No modifications to module imports in backend/main.mo are present in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Deploy the fixed backend canister to Internet Computer production network and verify it receives a permanent canister ID
missing_requirements.reason: No deployment configuration files, build scripts, or backend changes indicating production deployment are present in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Deploy the frontend to Internet Computer production network and generate a permanent public .ic0.app URL that works on mobile and laptop devices
missing_requirements.reason: No deployment configuration, dfx.json updates, or production build artifacts indicating frontend production deployment are present in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify the production deployment persists and remains accessible 24/7 without requiring platform login
missing_requirements.reason: No deployment verification, production URLs, or uptime configuration changes are present in the diff.

hallucinated_features.description: Enhanced Login page with Internet Identity integration including logout functionality and cache clearing
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly states 'Must not modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts or other immutable frontend paths' as a constraint and lists 'Implementing new features or functionality' as a non-goal. The Login.tsx modifications add new authentication features beyond the scope of fixing deployment compilation errors.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated HTML title from generic to 'CareerSphere - Your Career Path Navigator'
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is focused exclusively on fixing deployment compilation errors and publishing to production. Changing page titles is not requested and falls under non-goals of 'Implementing new features or functionality' and 'Changing the UI design or styling'.
